posts.com:
Nsure $NSURE

The Crypto Insurance industry is going to be a trillion dollar industry and there are currently only two projects out.
$NSURE which launched 2 weeks ago and $NXM.

The direct competitor of Nsure, $NXM had at ATH a 600m cap. Atm Nsure is only a 2.5m cap.

With Nsure’s new innovative model its likely going to be bigger than $NXM.

- What is Nsure?

Nsure is an open insurance platform for Open Finance. The project borrows the idea of Lloyd’s London, a market place to trade insurance risks, where premiums are determined by a Dynamic Pricing Model. Capital mining will be implemented to secure capital required to back the risks at any point of time. A 3-phase crowd voting mechanism is used to ensure every claim is handled professionally.

- 2m cap

- Big VC’s invested

- Recently got a W3F foundation grant (going to be integrated by Polkadot)

- To be integrated into multiple platforms

- Launching staking soon

If you stake your Nsure as an underwriter, you get 50% of every premium paid for coverage in that pool.

- Nsure burning mechanism

If a product goes through a successful claim, 50% of the tokens deposited in that specific product by underwriters are burnt.

- Listed on Uniswap, Bixmax, Gateio, likely to get listed on Huobi (Huobi is following Nsure) or Binance

- 0 Inflation for the next 3 months

- Only competitor is $NXM in a future trillion dollar industry

Website: https://h5.nsure.network/#/

Coingecko:
https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/nsure-network
